original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Santhavavagga
analyzed: santhava vagga

original: 2. Udarasaṁyatapañha
analyzed: udara sayata pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘Uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya,
analyzed: uttiṭṭhe na ppamajjeyya

original: udare saṁyato siyā’ti.
analyzed: udare sayataḥ siyāti

original: Puna ca bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: puna ca bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘ahaṁ kho panudāyi, appekadā iminā pattena samatitthikampi bhuñjāmi, bhiyyopi bhuñjāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham kho panudāyi appa ekadā iminā pattena sama titthikam pi bhuñjāmi bhiyyas pi bhuñjāmi iti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, udare saṁyato siyā’ti, tena hi ‘ahaṁ kho panudāyi, appekadā iminā pattena samatitthikampi bhuñjāmi, bhiyyopi bhuñjāmī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: uttiṭṭhe na pamajjeyya udare sayataḥ siyāti tena hi aham kho appa ekadā iminā pattena sama titthikam pi bhuñjāmi bhiyyas api bhuñjāmi iti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi tathāgatena bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi tathāgatena bhaṇita

original: ‘ahaṁ kho panudāyi, appekadā iminā pattena samatitthikampi bhuñjāmi, bhiyyopi bhuñjāmī’ti, tena hi ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, udare saṁyato siyā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: aham kho panudāyi appa ekadā iminā pattena sama titthikam pi bhuñjāmi bhiyyas api bhuñjāmi iti tena hi uttiṭṭhe na pamajjeyya udare sayataḥ siyā ati tam pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, udare saṁyato siyā’ti, bhaṇitañca—
analyzed: uttiṭṭhe na pamajjeyya udare sayataḥ siyā ti bhaṇitam ca

original: ‘ahaṁ kho panudāyi, appekadā iminā pattena samatitthikampi bhuñjāmi, bhiyyopi bhuñjāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham kho panudāyi appa ekadā iminā pattena sama titthikam pi bhuñjāmi bhiyyas pi bhuñjāmi iti

original: Yaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: ya mahā rāja bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, udare saṁyato siyā’ti, taṁ sabhāvavacanaṁ asesavacanaṁ nissesavacanaṁ
analyzed: uttiṭṭhe na pamajjeyya udare sayataḥ siyāti tam sabhāva vacanam asesa vacanam nissesa vacana

original: nippariyāyavacanaṁ bhūtavacanaṁ tacchavacanaṁ yāthāvavacanaṁ aviparītavacanaṁ isivacanaṁ
analyzed: nippariyāya vacanam bhūta vacanam taccha vacanam yāthāva vacanam aviparīta vacanam isi vacana

original: munivacanaṁ bhagavantavacanaṁ arahantavacanaṁ paccekabuddhavacanaṁ jinavacanaṁ sabbaññuvacanaṁ
analyzed: muni vacanam bhagavanta vacanam arahanta vacanam paccekabuddha vacanam jina vacanam sabbaññu vacana

original: tathāgatassa arahato sammāsambuddhassa vacanaṁ.
analyzed: tathāgatassa arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Udare asaṁyato, mahārāja, pāṇampi hanati, adinnampi ādiyati, paradārampi gacchati,
analyzed: udare a sayataḥ mahā rāja pāṇam pi hanati adinnam pi ādiyati paradāram pi gacchati

original: musāpi bhaṇati, majjampi pivati, mātarampi jīvitā voropeti, pitarampi jīvitā voropeti,
analyzed: musā api bhaṇati majjam pi pivati mātaram pi jīvitā voropeti pitaram pi jīvitā voropeti

original: arahantampi jīvitā voropeti, saṅghampi bhindati, duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitampi uppādeti.
analyzed: arahantam pi jīvitā voropeti saṅgham pi bhindati duṭṭhena cittena tathāgatassa lohitam pi uppādeti

original: Nanu, mahārāja, devadatto udare asaṁyato saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṭṭhiyaṁ kammaṁ āyūhi.
analyzed: nanu mahā rāja devadattaḥ udare a sayataḥ saṅgham bhinditvā kappaṭṭhiyam kammam āyūhi

original: Evarūpāni, mahārāja, aññānipi bahuvidhāni kāraṇāni disvā bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: evarūpāni mahā rāja aññāni api bahuvidhāni kāraṇāni disvā bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, udare saṁyato siyā’ti.
analyzed: uttiṭṭhe na pamajjeyya udare sayataḥ siyāti

original: Udare saṁyato, mahārāja, catusaccābhisamayaṁ abhisameti, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni sacchikaroti,
analyzed: udare sayataḥ mahā rāja catu sacca abhisamayam abhisameti cattāri sāmañña phalāni sacchikaroti

original: catūsu paṭisambhidāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu chasu abhiññāsu vasībhāvaṁ pāpuṇāti, kevalañca
analyzed: catūsu paṭisambhidāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu chasu abhiññāsu vasībhāvam pāpuṇāti kevalam ca

original: samaṇadhammaṁ pūreti.
analyzed: samaṇa dhammam pūreti

original: Nanu, mahārāja, sukapotako udare saṁyato hutvā yāva tāvatiṁsabhavanaṁ kampetvā sakkaṁ
analyzed: nanu mahā rāja su kapotakaḥ udare sayataḥ hutvā yāva tāvati sa bhavanam kampetvā

original: devānamindaṁ upaṭṭhānamupanesi, evarūpāni, mahārāja, aññānipi bahuvidhāni kāraṇāni
analyzed: devānamindam upaṭṭhānam upanesi evarūpāni mahā rāja aññāni api bahuvidhāni kāraṇāni

original: disvā bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: disvā bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyya, udare saṁyato siyā’ti.
analyzed: uttiṭṭhe na pamajjeyya udare sayataḥ siyāti

original: Yaṁ pana, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yam pana mahā rāja bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘ahaṁ kho panudāyi appekadā iminā pattena samatitthikampi bhuñjāmi, bhiyyopi bhuñjāmī’ti,
analyzed: aham kho panudāyi appa ekadā iminā pattena sama titthikam pi bhuñjāmi bhiyyas pi bhuñjāmi iti

original: taṁ katakiccena niṭṭhitakiriyena siddhatthena vusitavosānena nirāvaraṇena sabbaññunā
analyzed: tam kata kiccena niṭṭhita kiriyena siddhatthena vusita vosānena nirāvaraṇena sabbaññunā

original: sayambhunā tathāgatena attānaṁ upādāya bhaṇitaṁ.
analyzed: sayambhunā tathāgatena attānam upādāya bhaṇita

original: Yathā, mahārāja, vantassa virittassa anuvāsitassa āturassa sappāyakiriyā icchitabbā hoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vantassa virittassa anuvāsitassa āturassa sappāya kiriyā icchitabbā hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, sakilesassa adiṭṭhasaccassa udare saṁyamo karaṇīyo hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja sa kilesassa adiṭṭhasaccassa udare sayamaḥ karaṇīyaḥ hoti

original: Yathā, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa sappabhāsassa jātimantassa abhijātiparisuddhassa majjananighaṁsanaparisodhanena karaṇīyaṁ na hoti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja maṇi ratanassa sappabhāsassa jātimantassa abhijāti parisuddhassa majjana nighasana parisodhanena karaṇīyam na hoti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgatassa buddhavisaye pāramiṁ gatassa kiriyākaraṇesu āvaraṇaṁ na hotī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja tathāgatassa buddha visaye pāramim gatassa kiriyā karaṇesu āvaraṇam na hoti iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Udarasaṁyatapañho dutiyo.
analyzed: udara sayata pañhaḥ dutiyaḥ
